subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Addressing a friendly crowd and about 400 children at an annual charity bike-a-thon in his hometown, Akron, Ohio, James thanked his fans in Cleveland and all of northeast Ohio for supporting him through the years.
snippet: Addressing a friendly crowd and about 400 children at an annual charity bike-a-thon in his hometown, Akron, Ohio, James thanked his fans in Cleveland and all of northeast Ohio for supporting him through the years.
